title: 50 Bright Neon Yellow Fluorescent Color Cardstock - 11" X 17" (11X17 Inches) Tabloid|Ledger|Booklet Size - 65# lb/Pound Light Card Weight Cover Paper - Quality Printable Smooth Surface Sheets
features: Light Weight COVER with more rigidity and firmness than regular paper weight. This 65# Cardstock Cover is twice as thick as a sheet of 24# printer (60# text) paper. Just over twice as thick as a 20# copier bond paper. Equals 80 lb bristol and 97 lb index. 176 gsm (grams per square meter). Calipers at .01 inches.

Blank and PRINTABLE smooth finish. Bright paper stocks print well with most ink jet and laser printers. The intensity of bright paper colors do change the printed ink colors because inks are not completely opaque. Discover some interesting effects when printing colours on brights.

ARCHIVE FRIENDLY Acid-Free and Lignin Free Recycled paper with 30% post consumer recycled, as good stewards of the environment and with document preserving characteristics. Note that colors can look different on different monitors.
Go To -> STORE: Click on ThunderBolt Paper under title
description: BRIGHT PAPER for Printing, Writing, Posters, and Crafts
Won't Go Unnoticed Like White or Pastel Colors
-Bright, but not too dark to read black print -Print in color and get some interesting, colorful effects -Beyond the pale of pastel with a brilliant saturation of colored dyes
Easy to Print on the Blank, Printable Surface

The smooth surface makes this paper printable as well as good for handwriting, stamping, scrapbooking, and other craft projects. The 65# weight will run through most printers without jamming. Laser printers often don't handle a heavier 80# weight very well. A light weight cover|card stock which gives more stiffness for covers, posters and cards, but still handles a lot like text weight paper. Use your skills and imagination for do it yourself invitations and all kinds of other diy projects.
Nice Papers with Vibrant Colors and a Printable Surface

-65# Cover weight or paper thickness (equivalent to 47# bond|typewriter paper which is normally 20#) -Laser and ink jet printable -Color consistency from one order to the next, but may not match another paper brand -The brightness of this colour may bleed when wet or fade with exposure to light - due to the dyes used in making these intense colors -Recycled with 30% post consumer waste, as good stewards of the environment -Sizes to suit lots of different uses
If this paper is not as described and for some reason it is not what you were hoping for, you may return it for a full refund. We want all our customers to be happy ones.
Order now and we'll get your Bright Paper on the way!
